# professional_identity
Data Science Leader | Bridging PhD-Level Analytics & Executive Strategy.

I am a Data Science Leader and PhD Research Mathematician specializing in translating complex analytical theory into scalable AI solutions that drive business growth. With a background as a Big 4 Consultant Manager and an AI/ML Lecturer, I excel at bridging the gap between technical engineering teams and C-suite strategic objectives.

# bio
Dimitrios Panagopoulos is a Data Science Leader and PhD Mathematician who bridges the gap between rigorous analytical theory and executive business strategy. He specializes in building scalable AI solutions and fostering data-driven cultures within organizations, leveraging his experience as both a Big 4 consultant and an academic lecturer.
